name: AdriaComm-ICU
short_description:
ICU Collaboration is unique in its ability to deliver both web conferencing and videoconferencing functionality, without elaborate set-ups, and is the only product that accommodates H.323 and SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) devices during a session.

It is also the only conferencing solution with end-to-end security - encryption before transmission, decryption upon arrival. No costly security certificates are required while ICU Collaboration drills through the Internet to create Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). When used for presentations, the presenter remains in charge of all the tools associated with ICU Collaboration thus using fewer resources and requiring less bandwidth. However, the same high level of security is maintained for both presentations and meetings. No snoopers allowed with ICU Collaboration.
summary: AdriaComm's ICU is reeal time collaborations tool.
